QuestData.Title: I'll Just Leave This Here
QuestData.Description: Valtrois has a plan for the Sanctum's energy barrier.$B$BSeveral key Arcway locations throughout Suramar harness the power necessary for it. These Energy Disruptors she made will remotely break the links simultaneously on activation, causing the barrier to fall.$b$bTake these devices and install them at the leylines, then return here for the surprise assault on the Sanctum.
QuestData.LogDescription: Place Energy Disruptors at the energy sources in Teloth'aran, Kel'balor and Elor'shan in Suramar.
QuestData.RewardText: The preparations are nearly complete. Oculeth will be ready to teleport us soon.
